content.text: Match ends, Granada CF 1, Barcelona 2.
Second Half ends, Granada CF 1, Barcelona 2.
Attempt missed. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a through ball.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
Guilherme Siqueira (Granada CF) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Alves with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Yacine Brahimi (Granada CF) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Youssef El-Arabi.
Attempt blocked. Yacine Brahimi (Granada CF) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Diego Buonanotte.
Attempt saved. Íñigo López (Granada CF) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Allan Nyom with a cross.
Thiago Alcántara (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Thiago Alcántara (Barcelona).

Substitution, Granada CF. Diego Buonanotte replaces Nolito.
Goal!  Granada CF 1, Barcelona 2. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) from a free kick with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Substitution, Barcelona. Andrés Iniesta replaces Pedro.

Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Toño (Granada CF) because of an injury.

Pedro (Barcelona) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Cristian Tello.
Offside, Barcelona. Javier Mascherano tries a through ball, but Pedro is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Thiago Alcántara (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
